attributes.action: Treasury to stop unjust treatment of staff who blow the whistle
attributes.additional_details: That HM Treasury should give effect to the Government's policy articulated by the Prime Minister to "support whistleblowers and what they do to help improve the provision of public services" by reversing all actions towards whistleblowers that have been found by the British justice system to be unfair or unjust, and by reimbursing all legal costs incurred by whistleblowers subject to unfair or unjust treatment by HM Treasury.
